author: cnbc.com
title: U.S. Risk Names Jacklynn Lapchuk Associate Broker/Underwriter for Sacramento Territory
text:
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- U.S. Risk Insurance Group, Inc., the nation’s sixth largest property and casualty insurance wholesaler and MGA, announced today that it has named Jacklynn Lapchuk as an Associate Broker/Underwriter for the company’s Sacramento Territory.
Ms. Lapchuk has built a highly successful career in Sacramento with Burns & Wilcox and Bass Underwriters, through sales and underwriting leadership. She will use her extensive underwriting and marketing skills working closely with Charles Espinosa, Branch Vice President, U.S. Risk San Francisco Regional office, to expand the presence and visibility of U.S. Risk as an integrated specialty wholesaler in Sacramento. Ms. Lapchuk will build strategic relationships with current and potential agents, foster business growth and profitability, and leverage her deep client and industry knowledge to provide distinctive solutions that enhance customer value within the Sacramento Territory.
“We are pleased to have Jacklynn join our team at U.S. Risk,” said Mr. Espinosa. “Jacklynn’s addition supports and reinforces U.S. Risk’s commitment to the Sacramento Territory and will give our agents a local and seamless experience.”
About U.S. Risk Insurance Group, LLC
U.S. Risk Insurance Group, LLC ( www.usrisk.com ) is a leading international specialty lines underwriting manager and wholesale broker headquartered in Dallas, Texas. Operating 16 domestic and international branches, it offers a broad range of products and services through its affiliate companies, which include U.S. Risk Underwriters, U.S. Risk Brokers, U.S. Risk Solutions, U.S. Risk Financial Services, Oxford Insurance Brokers, Ltd. (UK), James Hampden International Insurance Brokers Ltd. (UK), Antarah FZE (UAE), and UNIS United Insurance Services (Zurich).
